page.title: 10RECREATION SPORTS&CLUBS 2
page.content: There is a small recreation area at the cricket field with swings , see -saw and slide , alongside a kick about area . I did a survey of{45 village children. Only 11% belong to clubs in the village . 8% go to village{youth club and 3% to{sunday school}.8% of the boys go to the{cubs}at Woore 4% of the boys go to{scouts}at Woore 11% of girl go to{brownies}at Market Drayton 8% of the girls go to{Guides}at Market Drayton 31% go to{Nantwich Pool}2% go to{Drayton Pool}82% go to{Tern Hill {Sports Centre}62% go to{Ice skating}8% go to{dancing}at Market Drayton 2% {play squash}.
